changeSet.createView: SELECT base_table.id , res.name AS grouping_agency, cls.name AS classifier, b.name AS classification, c.name AS child_relationship, ar.name AS authorized_relationship, ap.name AS authorized_parent, att.name AS authorized_attribute, base_table.sequence_number, base_table.text_value, base_table.integer_value, base_table.numeric_value, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, base_table.version FROM unit_attribute_authorization base_table LEFT JOIN unit_network_authorization na ON base_table.network_authorization = na.id LEFT JOIN agency res ON base_table.grouping_agency = res.id LEFT JOIN relationship cls ON na.classifier = cls.id LEFT JOIN relationship b ON na.classification = b.id LEFT JOIN relationship c ON na.child_relationship = c.id LEFT JOIN relationship ar ON na.authorized_relationship = ar.id LEFT JOIN relationship ap ON na.authorized_parent = b.id LEFT JOIN attribute att ON base_table.authorized_attribute = att.id LEFT JOIN agency up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id WHERE base_table.authorized_network_attribute IS NOT NULL;
